name: Comet - Galaxy 2 Player Edition
description:
This game is not related to the Comet story. It is just made for fun.

Part of the Comet series, this arcade style bullet hell game takes Comet - Galaxy and turns it into an infuriating 2 Player game!

Grab a friend and play this game with all new features such as:

  • Two modes! (Normal and Endless)
  • Shared lives!
  • New secrets!
  • The one keyboard and two player experience!

And if you don't have people to play with then you can always play by yourself for an extra challenge! Seriously, it's really difficult alone.

Available in a bundle with Comet - Galaxy for $2 here: 

The Comet - Galaxy Bundle by SyCreeper - itch.io
